testCase.name: TestReplayEngine replay should replay a simple recording
TestReplayEngine replay should handle recording with wait_for_output
TestReplayEngine replay should skip assertion and snapshot steps (Phase 2)
TestReplayEngine replay should handle errors in steps
TestReplayEngine replay should stop on error if stopOnError is true
TestReplayEngine replay should continue on error if stopOnError is false
TestReplayEngine replay should respect timeout option
TestReplayEngine replay should validate output if validateOutput is true
TestReplayEngine replay should cleanup sessions after replay
TestReplayEngine replayByName should load and replay recording by name
TestReplayEngine replayByName should throw error if recording not found
TestReplayEngine Speed control should replay at normal speed (1x)
TestReplayEngine Speed control should replay at 2x speed
TestReplayEngine Speed control should fast-forward when speed is 0
TestReplayEngine Static methods getReplayStats should calculate replay statistics
TestReplayEngine Static methods formatResult should format result as human-readable string
TestReplayEngine Static methods formatResult should include error message if present
